Title: Unauthenticated Path Disclosure
Description: It has been discovered, that calling a PHP script which is delivered with TYPO3 for testing purposes, discloses the absolute server path to the TYPO3 installation.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.15, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.4.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.15 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.4.0
